Title: FramedImage Module for DotNetNuke
Description: Module for DotNetNuke displaying image with a shadowed frame. Module is based on Media table and Media DAL and installation does not alter the database. To run it you need to have Media Module installed as well as Media table in your database. Module does not change the db table.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Module for DotNetNuke displaying image with a shadowed frame. Module is based on Media table and Media DAL and installation does not alter the database. To run it you need to have Media Module installed as well as Media table in your database. Module does not change the db table.

DNN FramedImage Module (compare the base setting with DNN: Media):



Samples of FramedImage:



The look of the image frame can be changed by setting of the FramedImage web custom control. It just partially implemented in DNN module yet.
You can install included web custom control FramedImage.cs to your VS toolbar and use it in any other web application.

Module is created partially in VB.NET and partially in C#. After installing the module please add this entries into web.config:
<codeSubDirectories>
<add directoryName="FramedImage" />
</codeSubDirectories>

and

<compilers>
<compiler language="c#;cs;csharp" extension=".cs" type="Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider,System, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral,
PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" warningLevel="4">
<providerOption name="CompilerVersion" value="v3.5" />
<providerOption name="WarnAsError" value="false" />
</compiler>
</compilers>

(I am not sure how to do it automatically)
